Package com.basiscomponents.db.export

Class SheetConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basiscomponents.db.export.SheetConfiguration
  • public class SheetConfiguration
extends Object
    Encapsulates the configurable attributes for an XLSX export
